text:
e="preserve">Lancelot J. "Lance" Acord (born September 9, 1964) A.S.C. is an American cinematographer.
Acord was born in Fresno County, California. He attended Sir Francis Drake High School's School Within A School (S.W.A.S.) program and went on to study photography and filmmaking at the San Francisco Art Institute. He began his professional career with Bruce Weber and together, they made documentaries, commercials and music videos.
His latest directorial work is '.
